## Events

| Event        | Description     | Type                              |
| ------------ | --------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `p6CloseTab` | Close tab event | `CustomEvent<{ tabId: string; }>` |

## Methods

### `close(tabId: string) => Promise<boolean>`

close a tab

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<boolean>`

### `refresh() => Promise<void>`

refresh the component

#### Returns
